description_txt: stated on December 31, 2018 in a post on Facebook:
quote_txt: A woman died mysteriously after reporting on Robert Mueller destroying text messages.

description_txt: stated on January 3, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says law enforcement officials alerted the public to check the caps of bottled water for tampering because someone is injecting poison into them, and that a "few people already died in the Richmond area" as a result.

description_txt: stated on December 17, 2018 in a speech:
quote_txt: New York has passed "the best paid family leave" program in the United States of America.

description_txt: stated on December 31, 2018 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: "I took over the school district when it had a $1 billion structural deficit and left them with $1 billion in cash and 70,000 more students than they have today."

description_txt: stated on January 2, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Mexico is paying for the Wall through the new USMCA Trade Deal."

description_txt: stated on December 13, 2018 in in a meeting:
quote_txt: "If the experiences in Colorado and Washington are the experiences we have here, roadway deaths are going to go up, impaired driving is likely to go up."

description_txt: stated on December 26, 2018 in remarks to U.S. troops:

description_txt: stated on December 19, 2018 in In a Facebook post:

quote_txt: Says George Washington said, "A free people ought not only be armed and disciplined. But they should have sufficient arms and ammunition to maintain a status of independence from any who might attempt to abuse them. Which would include their own government."
